item.title: Experience
item.description: Data Scientist @ Statistics Canada Working on Crop Area Estimation using Convolution LSTM Cells and 3D Convolution Networks Building a comment for 2021 Canadian Census using Semi-supervised learning and Bi-LSTM networks Developed a tool to help clients assess similarity between PDF documents and certain regulations (Accessible Canada Act) Software Developer @ ZS associates Spearheaded the development of a web application, used by the top pharmaceutical companies of the world.

item.title: Philosophy
item.description: This is my small corner on this vast Internet, I suppose.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Question Answering Tasks Using BERT models Experimented with different BERT based models such as DistilBERT, ELECTRA and RoBERTa on SQuaD 2.

item.title: About
item.description: Helloo! I’m currently working as a Data Scientist at Statistics Canada.

item.title: Python default arguments can be...tricky
item.description: Debugging is fun, and according to me debugging time exponentially increases if the code was written in a sloppy manner.

item.title: Intuitive understanding of Eigenvectors: Key to PCA
item.description: Truly understanding Principal Component Analysis (PCA) requires a clear understanding of the concepts behind linear algebra, especially Eigenvectors.
